description: This is a heavy machinery capable of producing biodiesel through a pyrolytic reaction, very scientific. Will only work if constructed in a building with an electric grid.
A device for extracting oil from seeds, 20% more efficient than manual oil extraction. Will only work if constructed in a building with an electric grid.
A device for extracting seeds from plants and fruits, it might not be more efficient but it's definitely faster than by hand. Will only work if constructed in a building with an electric grid.
